name: Beautiful Mallard-y
description:
Ducks don't pay their taxes. 

Every time tax season comes around the swans cause a ruckus in the duck pond, demanding their payments. The ducks have had enough. It's time to stop this.

Use a variety of combo moves and bring the fight to them. It's time to make them pay for a change.

A short 20 minute experience made in a weekend for the RPGMaker net 15th birthday event.
